message.subject: New topic notification - "http://wellnesscool.com/therma-trim-weight-loss/"
message.body:
Hello acrombies,

You are receiving this notification because you are watching the forum
"Rainmeter News" at "Rainmeter Forums". This forum has received a new topic
by MichLyons since your last visit,
"http://wellnesscool.com/therma-trim-weight-loss/". You can use the
following link to view the forum, no more notifications will be sent until

"Unsubscribe forum" link found in the forum above, or by clicking the
following link:

https://forum.rainmeter.net/viewforum.php?uid=43092&f=13&unwatch=forum

The Rainmeter Team
